book.title: Gump and Co. (Forrest Gump #2)
book.description:
Storyline: 
 This sequel to FORREST GUMP follows the protagonist of that book on his adventures in the 1980s. As in is predecessor, Gump manages to be present at momentous events; his impressions of them, leavened by his naivete, make up this book.
book.author: Winston Groom
